Comment: The WINDMILL- a DREADED trap, leading to a win on move #29, always satisfying. Also involving a neat deflection trick on move 20. I read about the windmill 3 months ago and was dying to practise it. Repeated use of a dicovered check. Amazing what you can pick up by reading a book- Killer chess tactics- Keene et al. Pl comment freely and pl rate. Fasten your seat belts for here we go...

Expanding into the kingside, my fav opening in last few months. Someone told me it is the Grand prix opening. 
I dont know, not formally schooled in basics. I just go for stuff like windmill and have fun.
